text: kya tumane isako nahin dekha ki allaah jaanata hai jo kuchh aakaashon mein hai aur jo kuchh dharatee mein hai. kabhee aisa nahin hota ki teen aadamiyon kee gupt vaarta ho aur unake beech chautha vah (allaah) na ho. aur na paanch aadamiyon kee hotee hai jisamen chhatha vah na hota ho. aur na isase kam kee koee hotee hai aur na isase adhik kee bhee, kintu vah unake saath hota hai, jahaan kaheen bhee ve ho; phir jo kuchh bhee unhonne kiya hoga qiyaamat ke din usase vah unhen avagat kara dega. nishchay hee allaah ko har cheez ka gyaan hai
